content.question: Which of the following best accounts for the success of the American Federation of Labor in organizing labor in the late 1800s?

choices.label: Its policy of organizing only skilled craftsmen
Its organization of all workers within a single industry into one union
Its campaign for a minimum wage
Its active recruitment of immigrant workers

content.answer: Its policy of organizing only skilled craftsmen

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
